EncodingOverride: Source encoding of the texture, exposing more options than just sRGB.
ColorSpace: Source color space of the texture.
RedChromaticityCoordinate: Red chromaticity coordinate of the source color space.
GreenChromaticityCoordinate: Green chromaticity coordinate of the source color space.
BlueChromaticityCoordinate: Blue chromaticity coordinate of the source color space.
WhiteChromaticityCoordinate: White chromaticity coordinate of the source color space.
ChromaticAdaptationMethod: Chromatic adaption method applied if the source white point differs from the working color space white point.
